Australia climate data

aus_climate.Rd

One year worth (2020) of climate data recorded in 72 stations across Australia. The data is computed from National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) using the rnoaa package.

aus_climate

Format

A cubble object with 5 station-related variables and 3 time-related variables (PRCP, TMAX, and TMIN), nested in the ts column

id

station id

lat

latitude of the station

long

longitude of the station

elev

elevation of the station

name

station name

wmo_id

the world meterological organisation (WMO) station number

ts

a list-column that nests all the time-wise measures: date, prcp, tmax, and tmin

Examples

library(rmapshaper)

#> Registered S3 method overwritten by 'geojsonlint':
#>   method         from 
#>   print.location dplyr
library(sf)

#> Linking to GEOS 3.8.1, GDAL 3.2.1, PROJ 7.2.1
library(ggplot2)
state_map <- ms_simplify(ozmaps::abs_ste, keep = 2e-3)
plot_map(state_map) +
  geom_point(data = aus_climate, aes(x = long, y = lat))
